text.__SUMMARY__: Lithocarpus erythrocarpus is a species of plant in the family Fagaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Chua, L.S.L. (1998). "Lithocarpus erythrocarpus". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31498A9633755. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31498A9633755.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
